0.text: Innate - Pyromania: Annie generates a stack of Pyromania whenever she casts an ability, stacking up to 4 times, at which she gains Energized.

1.text: Energized: When Annie succeeds in her next cast damaging ability, she consumes all Pyromania stacks and  stuns enemies hit for 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 (based on level) seconds.

2.text: Annie loses Energized and all Pyromania stacks upon death.

0.text: Active: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage.

1.text: If Disintegrate kills its target, half of the cooldown is  reduced and the  mana cost is refunded.

0.text: Active: Annie casts a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Active: Annie grants herself or the target allied  champion and  Tibbers a  shield for 3 seconds and 20% − 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.

1.text: While Molten Shield is active, enemies who  basic attack the target are dealt magic damage.

0.text: Active: Annie summons  Tibbers to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies near him. Summon: Tibbers can be recast at any time while  Tibbers is alive.

1.text: Tibbers then remains on the field as a controllable  pet for up to 45 seconds.

2.text: Recast: Annie directs  Tibbers to the target location.

3.text: Summon: Tibber's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control. See Pets for more details about  Tibbers.
